org.openjdk.tools.javac.main

类 OptionHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openjdk.tools.javac.main.OptionHelper
  • 直接已知子类:
    OptionHelper.GrumpyHelper

    public abstract class OptionHelper
extends Object
    Helper object to be used by Option.process(org.openjdk.tools.javac.main.OptionHelper, java.lang.String), providing access to the compilation environment.

    This is NOT part of any supported API. If you write code that depends on this, you do so at your own risk. This code and its internal interfaces are subject to change or deletion without notice.

    • 嵌套类概要

      嵌套类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      static class  OptionHelper.GrumpyHelper
      An implementation of OptionHelper that mostly throws exceptions.

    • 构造器概要

      OptionHelper() 

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      abstract String get(Option option)
      Get the current value of an option.
      abstract Log getLog()
      Get access to the Log for the compilation.
      abstract String getOwnName()
      Get the name of the tool, such as "javac", to be used in info like -help.
      abstract boolean handleFileManagerOption(Option option, String value)
      Handle a file manager option.
      abstract void put(String name, String value)
      Set the value of an option.
      abstract void remove(String name)
      Remove any prior value for an option.

    • 方法详细资料

      • get

        public abstract String get(Option option)
        Get the current value of an option.
        参数:
        option - the option
        返回:
        the value of the option

      • put

        public abstract void put(String name,
                         String value)
        Set the value of an option.
        参数:
        name - the primary name of the option
        value - the value for the option

      • remove

        public abstract void remove(String name)
        Remove any prior value for an option.
        参数:
        name - the primary name of the option

      • handleFileManagerOption

        public abstract boolean handleFileManagerOption(Option option,
                                                String value)
        Handle a file manager option.
        参数:
        option - the option
        value - the value for the option
        返回:
        true if the option was handled successfully, and false otherwise

      • getLog

        public abstract Log getLog()
        Get access to the Log for the compilation.
        返回:
        the log

      • getOwnName

        public abstract String getOwnName()
        Get the name of the tool, such as "javac", to be used in info like -help.
        返回:
        the name of the tool
